name: College of Glamour
description: Bards trained in the Feywild weave music and magic to captivate and beguile those around them.

3.name: Mantle of Inspiration
3.description: As a bonus action, expend a Bardic Inspiration to grant temporary hit points to creatures within 60 feet and allow them to move without provoking opportunity attacks.

3.name: Enthralling Performance
3.description: If you perform for at least 1 minute, choose humanoids within 60 feet who watched; they must succeed on a Wisdom save or be charmed for 1 hour, idolizing you and hindering opponents.

6.name: Mantle of Majesty
6.description: As a bonus action, cast command without a spell slot and take on a fey appearance for 1 minute, allowing you to cast command as a bonus action each turn.

14.name: Unbreakable Majesty
14.description: As a bonus action, assume a majestic presence for 1 minute. Creatures that try to attack you must make a Charisma save or choose another target; on a success they have disadvantage on saves against your spells on your next turn.

choices.name: College of Glamour Feature
choices.description: Choose an option for the College of Glamour subclass
